biotools.summary: This tool was developed based on the GenDB genome annotation system that was originally designed for prokaryotic genomes only. The system has been adapted to facilitate the creation and functional annotation of sequence features that are specific for eukaryotic genomes, e.g. intron and exon gene structures.

bioschemas.name: GenDBE
